text: {"fixed_xml":"<ITEM>In dem Brandmüllerischen Buchladen wird ein <BIBL><TITLE>Project von Hiorini klugen und verständigen Hauß-Vatter, wie auch avelichem Land-Leben</TITLE>, welches durch Sub. scriptionen in <VOLUME>2. Folianten</VOLUME> à <PRIZE>6. fl.</PRIZE> gedrucket wird</BIBL>. Ferner ist allda neü fertig worden: <BIBL><AUTHOR>Lutheri</AUTHOR> <TITLE>Bibel</TITLE> mit Figuren in <FORMAT>fol.</FORMAT></BIBL>; Item, des Herrn Abbts <BIBL><AUTHOR>Fleury</AUTHOR> <TITLE>Kirchen-Historien</TITLE> <FORMAT>8vo.</FORMAT> aus dem französischen ubersetzt</BIBL>; Item, <BIBL><TITLE>die gantze Pflicht des Menschen</TITLE> <FORMAT>8vo.</FORMAT> aus dem Englischen ubersetzt</BIBL></ITEM>","number_of_corrections":6,"explanation":"1. Moved the closing TITLE tag after \"Land-Leben\" instead of after \"Hiorini\" - the author name should not be inside the TITLE tag. 2. Removed the erroneous closing TITLE tag that appeared after \"AUTHOR\". 3. Fixed encoding: √∫ → ü, √ß → ß, √º → ü, √† → à, √∂ → ö. 4. Added missing BIBL opening tag before Fleury's work (the third item was missing proper BIBL wrapper). 5. Corrected structure so each bibliographic entry has proper BIBL tags. 6. Fixed the overall nesting to ensure all BIBL elements are properly closed."}

Added missing BIBL opening tag before Fleury's work (the third item was missing proper BIBL wrapper). 5. Corrected structure so each bibliographic entry has proper BIBL tags. 6. Fixed the overall nesting to ensure all BIBL elements are properly closed.
